Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2009 08:06PM VerJee wrote: Kendra, Hey you just keep on going, I have been doing all of that and more for the past 14 months, stage IV, 65% of my bone mass was cancer when it was caught!!  Guess what I just had my ovaries out last week and it was one of the easier things I've been through...(3 blood trans, 8 months of chemo and pain meds, 2 other surgeries and a billion side effects)  but hey I feel good and most of my cancer is gone. So hang in there OK...smile and kick butt.
Posts.Title: Chemo Break and Another Surgery Times3 VerJee
